welcome_message_body: Welcome to Verona, the city of love and romance, famous for its stunning architecture, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city. Enjoy your visit!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Valerio Catullo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trissino Airport handles all domestic and international flights.
